title: Click A Pic
summary: Click-A-Pic is a android wear application.
description: Must-have app for your smart watch!Click-A-Pic lets you click pictures right from your Android Wear device. Improve your phone’s battery life by using your smart watch as a viewfinder and click picture without even turning on your phone. Control Flash, Zoom in or out, set a Timer or even swap between the front and rear cameras all on your smart watch. Smart, Simple and Efficient. Features – •         Seamless Preview•         Flash toggle•         Zoom settings for front/rear camera•         Timer•         Camera toggleWhat’s different? –•         Improve your phone’s battery life by using your smartwatch as a viewfinder.•         Zoom on both front and rear cameras•         Ease of access - all toggles on the main interface•         Audio and Visual alert when the picture is clicked•         Easy to use minimalistic UI•         Bluetooth Low Energy Pairing
descriptionHTML:
Must-have app for your smart watch!

Click-A-Pic lets you click pictures right from your Android Wear device. Improve your phone’s battery life by using your smart watch as a viewfinder and click picture without even turning on your phone. Control Flash, Zoom in or out, set a Timer or even swap between the front and rear cameras all on your smart watch. Smart, Simple and Efficient.

Features –

• Seamless Preview
• Flash toggle
• Zoom settings for front/rear camera
• Timer
• Camera toggle

What’s different? –

• Improve your phone’s battery life by using your smartwatch as a viewfinder.
• Zoom on both front and rear cameras
• Ease of access - all toggles on the main interface
• Audio and Visual alert when the picture is clicked
• Easy to use minimalistic UI
• Bluetooth Low Energy Pairing
comments: Not for round watch It is not really for round watches like the moto 360. The flash is so far left, I just can't control it. How fo I switch between front and back camera? It does it I just don't see how I can control it. It just happens and mostly not when I want. If both are fixed I give it 5 stars.
Round screen Not optimal for round screens. Cuts off the end buttons making it unusable to a point
Great !! Works fine on Moto360. Buttons need be adjusted a bit for round dial but overall good..
Works just great on my square watch Cool
Every smart watch should have this app
Works perfectly on my LG smart watch.
recentChanges: full screen preview and controls on the preview.
